articles.description: It's been over 15 years since Jose Mourinho worked with Scott Parker during his first stint as Chelsea boss, in a season which saw the midfielder fall by the wayside in west London.
articles.content:
Fairly often in professional football, paths re-collide which will trigger either fondness or ill-feeling between two individuals - or perhaps a simple case of what might have been.
